flawed_nl_solution:
5 hours in the studio is the same as 5 * 60 = <<5*60=300>>300 minutes.
To record all of his songs, Elvis takes 12 * 10 = <<12*10=120>>120 minutes.
After editing and recording 300 - 120 - 30 = <<300-120-30=510>>510 minutes are left to write all of his songs.
Songwriting therefore took 510 / 10 = <<510/10=51.0>>51.0 minutes per song.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 510. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
